channel.title: Mindsets on Chenghao Li's Space
channel.description: Recent content in Mindsets on Chenghao Li's Space

item.title: Six types of mindsets
item.description: Recently I have been reading this book The book talks about various mindsets that possessed by most people and how these mindsets can change our thinking and behaviours. Here I list three pairs of mindsets from the book, each pair represent a positive and a negative view of things. Abundance Mindset v.s. Scarcity Mindset People who have an abundance mindset tend to think about the things that they have, whereas the scarcity minded people tend to focus on what they don’t possess.
